snippet: Advocates of overhauling New York State’s political fund-raising laws will spend more than $800,000 on a new campaign so typical New Yorkers can have their voices heard.
abstract: Advocates of overhauling New York State’s political fund-raising laws, in effort to build public support for reining in flood of money in politics, will spend over  $800,000 on  new advertising campaign.
lead_paragraph: Advocates of overhauling New York State’s political fund-raising laws will spend more than $800,000 on a new campaign so typical New Yorkers can have their voices heard.

headline.seo: Ads to Urge Change in N.Y. State Campaign Financing
headline.main: New Ads to Press Albany on Campaign Financing
headline.print_headline: New Ads to Press Albany On Campaign Financing
